p: More distant members of the orthocoronavinae subfamily can also provide inspiration for new therapeutic regimens, such as with studies done with feline coronavirus (FCoV) and its mutated form, feline infectious peritonitis virus (FIPV). The peptidyl bisulfite adducts GC376 and NPI64 (Figure 9) were both found to be potent inhibitors of FIPV replication at 0.04 μ m. 47 3CLpro of FIPV and SARS‐CoV share about 50 % sequence identity, but the overall structure is conserved. In a FRET‐based activity assay, the IC 50 value of GC376 against recombinant SARS 3CLpro was found to be 4.9 times that against FIPV 3CLpro (4.35 vs. 0.72 μ m, respectively). 48 In combination with a low compound cytotoxicity (CC 50>150 μ m and CC 50=61.91 μ m in CRFK cells for GC376 and NPI64, respectively), these masked‐aldehyde warheads should be investigated for efficacy on the 3CLpro of 2019‐nCoV as soon as possible.
